name: Lamica
sentences: Here, you can test out the three weapons you'll be using on your first mission: the bazooka, the quick gun and the pen gun.
You can use the pen gun to make a shield. It may also be useful to enter some areas hard to get into.
There are also some powerups located on the far wall.
Once you're finished, leave the base and meet your partner, Maya. You'll receive a sitrep en route.
Make sure you're prepared, you don't want to get hurt out there.
